word: To separate from it seems like tearing me to pieces. . . . We spared no effort to win souls to the truth. . . . Constantly the word of the Lord came to me, "Go forward. Annex new territory. Raise up companies of believers; build houses of worship. . . . Talk the truth earnestly." For nine years we have been doing this work.--Ms 96, 1900, pp. 1, 7, 8. (Diary, August 29 through September 1900, returning from Australia to America.)
